name: Call of the StarWhale
description:
Accompany a StarWhale on its journey through the universe and bring it back to its flock.

You can farm on the whale in 3rd person view, feed it with a food-cannon, exchange goods with the merchant that you have collected using a drone and use them to earn upgrades that make your journey easier. You're just a student and this is human's first trip so deep into the universe, but don't worry, Professor Laine will support you.
